artist: Itō Shinsui; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait; head and shoulders of a woman applying pigment to her lips with her finger, holding a blue and white container of pigment; red and white kimono with grey and white collar
marks: 大正十一年十月 {Taishō jūichinen jūgatsu} (October 1922) 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Lip Rouge
